parameters.content:
the project generates  5 essential columns:
arabic description - Full Arabic product description
product_title_ar - Arabic product title (50-80 characters)
meta_title - SEO meta title (â‰¤60 characters)
meta_description - SEO meta description (â‰¤155 characters)
handle_ar - SEO-friendly handle for URLs

PLUS TAGGING:
tags - Taxonomy tags for categorization
tagged - Whether product was successfully tagged
tag_confidence - Confidence level of tagging

click on excel and change the ID 

the ID IS the link of your excel file 
example has 
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iDbCdwFkCjZQ_cTUdbWg5IJifxn952YqWyKhA8b5YG4/edit?gid=120207084#gid=120207084
id is between d/ and  /edit 
in this case 1iDbCdwFkCjZQ_cTUdbWg5IJifxn952YqWyKhA8b5YG4
